alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jefferson, northern Taylor and Madison Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1215 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Monticello to 17 miles east of Woodville to 18 miles west of Perry. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Madison, Perry, Greenville, Ebb, Lamont, Hamburg, Pinetta, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Drifton, Scanlon, Foley, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Sirmans and Shady Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison
